backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (User, Post, Event, Notification, etc.) and state maps for a community platform, with authorization, blob storage, and user approval mixins included.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report declaring a retry deployment with no code changes, listing the affected frontend files and component dependencies for the build.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing key frontend page and component files, noting that pages were refactored to be self-contained by fetching props internally via hooks for TanStack Router compatibility.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AnthroVerse frontend app, mounting the React app at the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, renders a profile setup modal for new users, and defines the TanStack Router layout with sidebar and all page routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/RoleAssign: Admin panel for managing user approvals and role assignments, displaying pending, approved, and rejected users with actions to approve, reject, or assign roles.
frontend/src/components/admin/TenureMana: Admin dialog for starting a new organizational tenure by selecting officers (president, VP, secretary-treasurer) and a tenure period, with a warning that all elevated roles will be reset.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky app header component displaying a sidebar toggle and a notification bell dropdown that fetches, displays, and marks notifications as read.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component that renders nav links based on user role/admin status, displays the user's profile avatar and role badge, and handles logout.
Provides the full-screen authentication page layout with a background image, overlay, logo, and a card container for auth form children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginForm.t: Login form that triggers Internet Identity authentication with a single button, showing a loading state and a link to switch to the signup form.
Multi-step signup form that first connects an Internet Identity, then collects name, email, and a required profile photo before saving the user profile and uploading the picture.
frontend/src/components/auth/WaitingForA: Displays a 'Pending Approval' screen for users awaiting admin approval, with options to send an approval request or sign out.
frontend/src/components/chapter-growth/G: Renders a private group feed filtered by post category, with support for creating new posts and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/events/CreateEve: A dialog form for creating new events with title, description, date, registration limit, and optional banner image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/events/EventCard: Displays an event card with banner, details, and a registration button that tracks upcoming vs. past status and existing registration state.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostF: A form component for submitting new posts with category selection, text content, and optional image upload; supports announcement category for privileged roles.
frontend/src/components/feed/PendingAppr: Fetches all posts and renders only those with pending status as a labeled section with a count badge.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a single post with like, comment, delete, and approve actions, with role-based permission checks and lazy-loaded comments on expand.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostFilters: Renders post filtering UI with category tab buttons, a 'My Posts' toggle, and a search input for filtering by member name.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Provides the main app shell with a sticky header, responsive navigation links (including role-gated routes), theme toggle, notification bell, and user avatar/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple reusable animated loading spinner component with configurable size variants.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Bell icon button that shows an unread count badge and opens a popover with the NotificationPanel, marking notifications as read on open.
Renders a single notification row with a type-specific icon, message text, relative timestamp, and an unread indicator dot.
Displays a scrollable list of sorted NotificationItem rows inside a popover panel, or an empty state when there are no notifications.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a single post card with like, comment, delete, and approve actions, using role-based visibility for admin/author controls and a dropdown menu for post management.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedSection: A wrapper component that conditionally renders children only if the current user's role matches one of the allowed roles, otherwise rendering a fallback.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Displays a styled badge for a user's role, with special handling for root admin display and configurable size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) ICP backend actor via React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context with login/logout helpers, delegation validation, and status flags, exposed via the useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app's backend actor, covering user profiles, posts, events, notifications, comments, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Poppins and Inter fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for the AnthroVerse purple-themed design system including light/dark mode color tokens, glass utilities, and role badge styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module providing helper functions for class merging (cn), role/category label formatting, timestamp formatting, permission checks by role, and post status badge styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing user approvals (approve/reject pending members) and assigning roles to users by principal, plus a tenure management section.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication page that toggles between LoginForm and SignupForm views within an AuthLayout wrapper.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterGrowthPage.tsx: Analytics page displaying chapter statistics (members, posts, events) with Recharts bar, line, and pie charts showing post activity over time, category distribution, and member approval status.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Events page that lists upcoming and past events as cards with registration support, and provides a dialog form for authorized users to create new events with optional banner image upload.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main social feed page that displays posts with likes, comments, approval, and deletion functionality, supporting category filtering and role-based permissions for admin/LT users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with a two-panel layout featuring Internet Identity authentication, displaying platform branding and feature highlights on the left and a sign-in button on the right.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing avatar, role badge, and tabbed views for posts and events, with dialogs for editing name/email and uploading a profile picture.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Onboarding form for new users to set their full name, email, and optional profile photo before completing registration.
frontend/src/pages/WaitingApprovalPage.t: Holding page shown to users pending admin approval, with buttons to request approval, refresh status, or log out.
frontend/src/utils/permissions.ts: Utility functions for role-based permission checks and display helpers, covering actions like posting announcements, managing users, and assigning roles based on the user's Role enum value.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for formatting nanosecond BigInt timestamps into relative time strings, human-readable dates, and converting Date objects back to nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), an extended OKLCH-based color palette (primary, gold, teal, purple, sidebar, chart), border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing AnthroVerse, a Flutter/Firebase members-only app with role-based governance, approval workflows, and a Purple Edition design system, including architectural notes, known issues, and a versioned list of implemented features.
